comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Jukka, could you please commit this fix also in the 1.0 branch and close this issue?

If you think this should not be included in 1.0 please set the fixed version to 1.0.1 and close this issue. Thanks.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
This is a weird glitch. I suppose the only reasonable explanation for this would be me accidentally pasting random garbage after opening the file for manual inspection after running the SLF4J conversion script. Sorry about that. :-/

Merged to 1.0 in revision 389545.

description:
Somehow during the switch to SL4J also a String literal in the SearchIndex class got garbled.

See:
http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/incubator/jackrabbit/trunk/jackrabbit/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/core/query/lucene/SearchIndex.java?rev=385280&r1=378221&r2=385280

Since this is a low risk change I would like to get this included into the 1.0 branch.
